title: 0001: Failed Loading
body: I just finished the new patched and received the error message 0001: Failed loading mod/win/ClientWindow.dat due to invalid dependencies: lib.external.test.flex.4.runners.flexunit-uilistener-4. I tried to re open the patch client and i just get straight through and the same error message.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could all the people in this thread experiencing this issue please try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.

If you're unable to open the patcher, could you please download the [hextech tookit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi). Install it, run as Administrator, select your region and language and check the force repatch button, don't forget to click start. (Image below)

http://puu.sh/nQLhg/0cc110c6f2.jpg
Just "repairing your client, and it worked for me!! THX.

After each patch im unable to open the patcher and i receive the following error message "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"
After a couple of days everything works.
But if i don't want to wait, do you think the hextech tookit can fix this?
I still have windows 7 (i refuse to get windows 10) do you think that's why it takes so long before being able to open the patcher ?
ty

It worked. 
THX YOU

I'm experiencing the same issue "0001: Failed loading mod/win/ClientWindow.dat due to invalid dependencies: lib.external.test.flex.4.runners.flexunit-uilistener-4." so I'm running a repair file to see if it works, however, if it doesn't, does anyone have another idea I can use just in case? I have win 10 btw in case there is a specific program for it. THANK YOU!
I did the repair and it worked fine, so in case you guys see the error code as well, try the repair.
